Submission of Evidence and Other Rights Afforded to the Substitute Claimant
A substitute claimant has the same rights as would have applied to the original claimant had they not died, including the rights regarding
hearings
representation
legacy appeals
decision review options for a claim
not
finally adjudicated,
and
submission of evidence.
